column5: My comfortable 1596 sq.ft, 3 bedroom/2 private bathroom home sits on a quiet street just a few blocks away from Magnolia St's restaurants, and less than 2 miles from downtown Fort Worth. The entire house including 2 private bedrooms & 2 bathrooms are available for the guests' use. Though it is a 3 bedroom home, I host guests only in the 2 bedrooms, with their 2 bathrooms.
column8: Cozy Fort Worth Historic Home near Magnolia Street
